subject: TRIAG3 pricing for 80 users
body:
Hi TRIAG3 team,
We need pricing for ~80 users and onboarding timeline. Can we schedule a demo next week?
Thanks,
Mila

subject: Request for proposal (RFP)
body:
Hello,
Please share your RFP response template, security documentation, and SLA options.
Regards,
Northwind Procurement

subject: Discount for students/non-profit?
body:
Hi,
Do you offer any discounts for student teams or non-profit orgs?
Best regards,
Liam

subject: SSO / SAML support question
body:
Hi,
Do you support SSO (SAML/SCIM)? If yes, which identity providers are supported?
--
Globex IT

subject: Need trial access
body:
Can you enable a 14-day trial for our team? We want to test routing accuracy.
Thanks.

subject: Enterprise plan + dedicated support
body:
We are evaluating TRIAG3 for enterprise. Do you have dedicated support and uptime guarantees?
Regards,
CEO

subject: Login error 403
body:
Hi Support,
Since yesterday we get 403 when logging in. It happens for multiple users.
Please advise.

subject: System is slow after latest update
body:
Hello,
The dashboard is very slow today. Pages load in 20-30 seconds.
Can you check?
Thanks.

subject: Webhook not firing
body:
Hi,
Our webhook events stopped firing around 09:40 UTC. No changes on our side.
Can you investigate?

subject: Cannot reset password
body:
I click reset password but never receive an email.
Please help.

subject: Bug: exported CSV columns wrong
body:
The CSV export columns are shifted. Column headers do not match values.
Steps: open reports -> export CSV.

subject: Possible account compromise
body:
We see suspicious login attempts from unknown IPs. Can you help us lock the account and audit access?
Regards,
Security Team

subject: Invoice INV-2025-104 payment status
body:
Hello,
Can you confirm payment status for invoice INV-2025-104?
Thank you.

subject: Update billing address
body:
Hi,
We need to update our billing address on file for future invoices.
Thanks.

subject: Refund request for duplicate charge
body:
We were charged twice this month. Please refund the duplicate charge.
Order ref: 88312.

subject: W-9 / tax documents
body:
Could you provide your W-9/tax documents for our vendor setup?
Regards,
Accounts Payable

subject: Hello
body: Hi there.

subject: Partnership discussion
body:
We'd like to discuss a partnership and co-marketing opportunities.
Who should we talk to?

subject: Candidate reference check
body:
This is an HR reference check request. Please confirm employment dates for a former employee.
Thanks.

subject: FWD: customer complaint escalated
body:
Forwarding customer complaint.
On Tue someone wrote:
Previous email thread content...
--
Auto-forwarder
